Kruskal-Wallis Test of metrics; separate Basal vs Starved analysis
*NONPARAMETRIC DATA**multiple replicates*
```{r}

install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("ggpubr")
install.packages("rstatix")
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)


KW_M1<-kruskal_test(MandersM1~Type, data=temp)
summary(KW_M1)
dt_M1<-dunn_test(MandersM1~Type, data=temp, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

KW_M2<-kruskal_test(MandersM2~Type, data=temp)
summary(KW_M2)
dt_M2<-dunn_test(MandersM2~Type, data=temp, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

KW_MOC<-kruskal_test(MandersMOC~Type, data=temp)
summary(KW_MOC)
dt_MOC<-dunn_test(MandersMOC~Type, data=temp, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

KW_PCC<-kruskal_test(PearsonCoeff~Type, data=temp)
summary(KW_PCC)
dt_PCC<-dunn_test(PearsonCoeff~Type, data=temp, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

KW_nonGolVol<-kruskal_test(nonGolATG9Vol~Type, data=temp)
summary(KW_nonGolVol)
dt_nonGolVol<-dunn_test(nonGolATG9Vol~Type, data=temp, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

KW_nonGolMaxInt<-kruskal_test(nonGolATG9MaxInt~Type, data=temp)
summary(KW_nonGolMaxInt)
dt_nonGolMaxInt<-dunn_test(nonGolATG9MaxInt~Type, data=temp, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

KW_GolMaxInt<-kruskal_test(GolATG9MaxInt~Type, data=temp)
summary(KW_GolMaxInt)
dt_GolMaxInt<-dunn_test(GolATG9MaxInt~Type, data=temp, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

KW_nonGolMaxIntCell<-kruskal_test(AveATG9MaxIntPerCell~Type, data=tidy)
summary(KW_nonGolMaxIntCell)
dt_nonGolMaxIntCell<-dunn_test(AveATG9MaxIntPerCell~Type, data=tidy, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

KW_nonGolVolCell<-kruskal_test(AveATG9VolPerCell~Type, data=tidy)
summary(KW_nonGolVolCell)
dt_nonGolVolCell<-dunn_test(AveATG9VolPerCell~Type, data=tidy, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")

KW_GolMaxIntCell<-kruskal_test(AveATG9gMaxIntPerCell~Type, data=tidy)
summary(KW_GolMaxIntCell)
dt_GolMaxIntCell<-dunn_test(AveATG9gMaxIntPerCell~Type, data=tidy, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
```


R-bind and export results from Kruskal-Wallis and Dunn test
```{r}
Dunn_ATG9<-rbind(dt_M1,dt_M2,dt_MOC,dt_PCC,dt_nonGolVol,dt_nonGolMaxInt,dt_GolMaxInt,dt_nonGolMaxIntCell,dt_nonGolVolCell,dt_GolMaxIntCell)



write.csv(Dunn_ATG9, file= "./stats/Dunn_ATG9_4019-4020-4022-4026_3Mar22.csv")

```
